1. Upload the make-builder folder to the wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

sections.faq:
Can I use my own themes?

Absolutely! Make Builder gets out of the way and is designed to work in any theme. So just choose your perfect theme, and know that Make Builder will help you to get the most of out it.

How can I upgrade to Make Plus?

Make Plus is an amazingly powerful add-on plugin for Make Builder. To upgrade, check out our Make Builder website.

Where can I get help?

sections.changelog:
1.1.10

  • Bugfix: Removed misbehaving welcome form.

1.1.9

  • Bugfix: Toggle between Make Builder and Gutenberg was showing when Gutenberg was not available.

1.1.8

  • Improvement: Wrap block editor’s related logic in admin context to prevent issue with third party plugins.

1.1.7

  • Improvement: It’s now possible to switch between Make Builder and the block editor in WordPress 5.0 on a per post/page basis.
  • Bugfix: Editor height in content edit overlay only allowed showing one line of text on WordPress 5.0.

1.1.6

  • Make compatibility notice dismissible.

1.1.5

  • Added WordPress 5.0 editor compatibility notice.

1.1.4

Bug fix: Hide HappyForms notice if Make Plus is active.

1.1.3

  • Improvement: added a Custom CSS option to Button format for easier global customization.
  • Bug fix: Column sorting was messing up column resizing in Content sections.
  • Bug fix: Global discussion settings were being ignored in posts and pages.
  • Bug fix: Color picker customizations were interfering with core and third party color pickers.
  • Bug fix: Content section was ignoring filtered default amount of columns.

1.1.2

  • Bug fix: Color picker controls misbehave on WordPress 4.9.
  • Improved: Removed double serialization of Make data which was causing issues with migration plugins.

1.1.1

  • A script was interfering with hamburger navigation link in Twenty Seventeen.

1.1

  • Bug fix: Sections tiled backgrounds were misbehaving.

1.0

  • Initial release.
